title: Pokemon EV Tracker
description: App that allows you to view hidden stats of pokemons in nintendo DS pokemon games

title: Tower of Babel
description: 2D roguelike game where players try to ascend to the highest floors of a tower riddled with enemies

title: LoL eSports Ranking Model
description: Machine learning model that produces a power ranking of the competitive League of Legends teams

title: SmoFree - Quit Smoking!
description: Mobile app that assists smokers overcome their nicotine addictions

title: Bill Splitting App
description: Web app that allows you to keep track of who owes others money

title: Pokemon Team Draft Manager
description: Desktop app to create and edit pokemon team draft ideas
